headline: Snap-on Incorporated (SNA): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on Snap-on Incorporated on MaxDividends’s Substack. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on SNA. Snap-on Incorporated’s share was trading at $368.12 as of February 9th. SNA’s trailing and forward P/E were 19.18 and 18.18 respectively according to Yahoo Finance.
